text.text_translated: Sam looked at the sun. He saw dust far away. A car made the dust. The car went to the Big House. Horses moved their tails. Flies were on them. The horses did not care. Their owner was coming. His name was Mr Carter. He did not visit for ten months. Sam waited. Mr Carter did not often come here. Sam liked this. Sam wanted to stay away from his boss. Then Sam could keep his job. Mr Carter wiped his neck. He wiped sweat. His shirt was wet. His skin was red from the sun. It was June. He had light skin. He stayed inside a lot. He made money. Other people did the work.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Sam closed his eyes a little because of the sun.
He saw a car far away.
The car made a dust trail. The dust went up.
The car went to the Big House.
The horses kicked. They hit flies with their tails.
They did not care about their owner's visit.
Their owner was coming. He did not visit for ten months.
Sam waited.
Mr. Carter was Sam's boss. He did not come here often.
He came only if he needed to.
Sam liked this.
Sam stayed away from his boss. This way, he could keep his job.
Mr. Carter wiped sweat from his neck.
His shirt was wet.
The wet areas looked like shapes on a map.
His skin became red. The sun in June made it red.
His skin was not dark from the sun. It showed he stayed inside.
He got money. Other people did the work for him.
